table_description: Azure Compute Virtual Machine Scale Set VM

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the scale set VM.

columns.name: scale_set_name
columns.description: Name of the scale set.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique id identifying the resource in subscription.

columns.name: instance_id
columns.description: The virtual machine instance ID.

columns.name: latest_model_applied
columns.description: Specifies whether the latest model has been applied to the virtual machine.

columns.name: power_state
columns.description: Specifies the power state of the VM.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource in Azure.

columns.name: license_type
columns.description: Specifies that the image or disk that is being used was licensed on-premises.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The location of the resource.

columns.name: model_definition_applied
columns.description: Specifies whether the model applied to the virtual machine is the model of the virtual machine scale set or the customized model for the virtual machine.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The sku name.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: Specifies the capacity of virtual machines in a scale set virtual machine.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set virtual machine.

columns.name: vm_id
columns.description: Azure virtual machine unique ID.

columns.name: additional_capabilities
columns.description: Specifies additional capabilities enabled or disabled on the virtual machine in the scale set. For instance: whether the virtual machine has the capability to support attaching managed data disks with UltraSSD_LRS storage account type.

columns.name: availability_set
columns.description: Specifies information about the availability set that the virtual machine should be assigned to. Virtual machines specified in the same availability set are allocated to different nodes to maximize availability.

columns.name: plan
columns.description: Specifies information about the marketplace image used to create the virtual machine.

columns.name: protection_policy
columns.description: Specifies the protection policy of the virtual machine.

columns.name: resources
columns.description: The virtual machine child extension resources.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: Resource tags.

columns.name: upgrade_policy
columns.description: The upgrade policy for the scale set.

columns.name: virtual_machine_diagnostics_profile
columns.description: Specifies the boot diagnostic settings state.

columns.name: virtual_machine_hardware_profile
columns.description: Specifies the hardware settings for the virtual machine.

columns.name: virtual_machine_network_profile
columns.description: Specifies properties of the network interfaces of the virtual machines.

columns.name: virtual_machine_network_profile_configuration
columns.description: Specifies the network profile configuration of the virtual machine.

columns.name: virtual_machine_os_profile
columns.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the virtual machines.

columns.name: virtual_machine_security_profile
columns.description: Specifies the Security related profile settings for the virtual machine.

columns.name: virtual_machine_storage_profile
columns.description: SSpecifies the storage settings for the virtual machine disks.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: The Logical zone list for scale set.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
